citation: Proclamation under the Public Health Act 1997 (Tas)
text:
Proclamation under the Public Health Act 1997

I, the Governor in and over the State of Tasmania and its Dependencies in the Commonwealth of Australia, acting with the advice of the Executive Council, by this my proclamation made under section 2 of the Public Health Act 1997 â€“

        (a) fix 1 February 1998 as the day on which that Act commences; and
        (b) declare that this proclamation takes effect on the day on which its making is notified in the Gazette.
22 January 1998

G. S. M. GREEN

Governor

By His Excellency's Command,

PETER McKAY

Minister for Community and Health Services

Displayed and numbered in accordance with the Rules Publication Act 1953.

Notified in the Gazette on 28 January 1998

This proclamation is administered in the Department of Community and Health Services.
